page.title: 01The 12Km. around Harberton
page.content:
Our survey covers a rural area around the small village of Harberton, about two miles from the country town of Totnes.
The economy of the area is based on farming and tourism, but most aspects of daily life for most people depend on facilities outside the area.
The landscape is undulating, gently rolling hills, valleys, small woods and copses, rivers and streams, a patchwork of lush green fields and rich red soil - picture book Devon countryside.
The area is situated between the hills of Dartmoor and the coast of South Devon. The main road between Totnes and the coastal towns of Kingsbridge and Dartmouth runs through the area.
